divs: Sighting DetailsI was filming the moon on Feb 18th. I was pointed east and the UFO flew from the south to the north right into my viewfinder. It was travelling very fast, so fast I did not have to time to react to try continuing tracking it on video. I had no doubt it is an ET craft from the first when I saw it fly by and then later looking at the video. I was pretty amazed to see it although I have several others on video. This one seems to be very large and disc or cylinder shaped. It appears to fly behind the moon but I am not 100% percent sure about that. I am about 11 miles from a DFW airport so this has to be close to their airspace.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Hurst
There were no other sightings in Hurst on or around February 18th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
